trans-unit.source: When Legion's Landing enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Vampire creature token with lifelink. When you attack with three or more creatures, transform Legion's Landing.
"I claim this land in the name of the queen."\n—Adrian Adanto of Lujio

trans-unit.resname: PXTC·22 | Adanto, the First Fort | Card Text
trans-unit.source: (Transforms from Legion's Landing.) {T}: Add {W}. {2}{W}, {T}: Create a 1/1 white Vampire creature token with lifelink.

trans-unit.resname: PXTC·74 | Search for Azcanta | Card Text
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, surveil 1. Then if you have seven or more cards in your graveyard, you may transform Search for Azcanta. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.)

trans-unit.resname: PXTC·74 | Search for Azcanta | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The Sunken Ruin houses all the learning of a long-forgotten age.

trans-unit.resname: PXTC·74 | Azcanta, the Sunken Ruin | Card Text
trans-unit.source: (Transforms from Search for Azcanta.) {T}: Add {U}. {2}{U}, {T}: Look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a noncreature, nonland card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

trans-unit.resname: PXTC·90 | Arguel's Blood Fast | Card Text
trans-unit.source: {1}{B}, Pay 2 life: Draw a card. At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have 5 or less life, you may transform Arguel's Blood Fast.

trans-unit.resname: PXTC·90 | Arguel's Blood Fast | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Arguel's vision led him into the jungles of Ixalan ...

trans-unit.resname: PXTC·90 | Temple of Aclazotz | Card Text
trans-unit.source: (Transforms from Arguel's Blood Fast.) {T}: Add {B}. {T}, Sacrifice a creature: You gain life equal to the sacrificed creature's toughness.

trans-unit.resname: PXTC·90 | Temple of Aclazotz | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: ... to the lost temple of a bat-god of night, eternal enemy to the Threefold Sun.

trans-unit.resname: PXTC·173 | Vance's Blasting Cannons | Card Text
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, exile the top card of your library. If it's a nonland card, you may cast that card this turn. Whenever you cast your third spell in a turn, you may transform Vance's Blasting Cannons.

trans-unit.resname: PXTC·173 | Vance's Blasting Cannons | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: With a broadside assault, Captain Vance carved the cliffs to form her new home.
(Transforms from Vance's Blasting Cannons.) {T}: Add {R}. {2}{R}, {T}: Spitfire Bastion deals 3 damage to any target.
Now instead of a ship, Ripley Vance commands a fortress.

trans-unit.resname: PXTC·191 | Growing Rites of Itlimoc | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When Growing Rites of Itlimoc enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. At the beginning of your end step, if you control four or more creatures, transform Growing Rites of Itlimoc.

trans-unit.resname: PXTC·191 | Itlimoc, Cradle of the Sun | Card Text
trans-unit.source: (Transforms from Growing Rites of Itlimoc.) {T}: Add {G}. {T}: Add {G} for each creature you control.

trans-unit.resname: PXTC·191 | Itlimoc, Cradle of the Sun | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Before the Sun Empire was born, humans and merfolk joined their magic to invoke a blessing of fertility on the land.

When Conqueror's Galleon attacks, exile it at end of combat, then return it to the battlefield transformed under your control. Crew 4 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 4 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)
(Transforms from Conqueror's Galleon.) {T}: Add {C}. {2}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card. {4}, {T}: Draw a card. {6}, {T}: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

When Dowsing Dagger enters the battlefield, target opponent creates two 0/2 green Plant creature tokens with defender. Equipped creature gets +2/+1. Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, you may transform Dowsing Dagger. Equip {2}
(Transforms from Dowsing Dagger.) {T}: Add three mana of any one color.
The pirates had ventured into the interior for treasure. They found something far greater.

Instant and sorcery spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, put a charge counter on Primal Amulet. Then if there are four or more charge counters on it, you may remove those counters and transform it.
(Transforms from Primal Amulet.) {T}: Add one mana of any color. When that mana is spent to cast an instant or sorcery spell, copy that spell and you may choose new targets for the copy.

{3}, {T}: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. At the beginning of your end step, if you control seven or more lands, transform Thaumatic Compass.
"Clearly, it indicates the aetheric azimuth of ..."\n—Jace Beleren

trans-unit.resname: PXTC·249 | Spires of Orazca | Card Text
trans-unit.source: (Transforms from Thaumatic Compass.) {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Untap target attacking creature an opponent controls and remove it from combat.

trans-unit.resname: PXTC·249 | Spires of Orazca | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "... a cryptic objective."\n—Jace Beleren

{1}, {T}: Scry 1. Put a landmark counter on Treasure Map. Then if there are three or more landmark counters on it, remove those counters, transform Treasure Map, and create three Treasure tokens. (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
(Transforms from Treasure Map.) {T}: Add {C}. {T}, Sacrifice a Treasure: Draw a card.
Half the treasure is the glory of finding it.
